page.title: 11 Wolverhampton Entertainment
page.content: Entertainment is centred around communal groups.Pubs,Working Mens Clubs and social groups are numerous and have domino,darts and bowling leagues. Some areas have devloped community centres. A typical centre operates at Low Hill and is open 0845-2200hrs daily. All age groups in the Masefield-Keats Road area are catered for.Playgroups,lunch clubs, keep fit,youth-club,band and a library are all provided. In July each year a carnival is held. The theme for 1985 is Wolverhampton's Millenary.At Easter and Christmas fetes and parties are held. People make their own entertainment. Park Village Centre offers sports facilities throughout the day. Playdays are held during the summer holidays for children from 1000-1600hrs daily. Bushbury and Heathtown swimming pools are open daily. There are five public libraries in the area.
